# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the substation unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the APC unit's Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC unit's current Load* (W).
## 1.2. P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit
- Check that P.A.C.M.A.N. generator units are anchored to the floor. - Check that P.A.C.M.A.N. generator units are fueled. For extended flights make sure that you have enough fuel stockpiled to sustain prolonged power generation. - Check that P.A.C.M.A.N. generator units are set to HV output. - Start P.A.C.M.A.N. generator units.
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Check that the air canister is anchored to connector port. - Check that the distribution pump is set to 101kPa. - Check that the distribution loop pump is enabled.
## 2.2. Waste Loop
- Check that the waste loop pump is enabled.
## 3. Other checks
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled.
## Sidenotes
* - Gondola-class shuttles are intended for recreational flights. To ensure any and all activities on-board are consentual for all participants, it is recommended to avoid the use of mid-shift hiring via crew records console.
